A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 3.5/5.  While The Last Jedi is a good movie\, it suffers from several sever flaws.  It's much too long\, it has too many new characters that all feel underdeveloped\, and one of the major storylines feels completely unnecessary.  However\, what The Last Jedi gets right\, it really gets right.  Mark Hamil\, Daisy Ridley\, and Adam Driver are all phenomenal and make the movie worth seeing.  But with all of the hype surrounding this film\, I can't help but feel a bit disappointed.
